'''LuaCollections''' is an extension that provides some basic Lua collections and a few tools for Lua modules. This makes it somewhat easier to manage collections in Lua code.

For a full Vagrant setup, see [https://jeblad.github.io/LuaCollections/topics/vagrant.md.html the documentation].
